experimentSetting

Class CoTrainingSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • experimentSetting.CoTrainingSettings

  • public class CoTrainingSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton object encapsulating all experiment settings for co-training

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear() 
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getGrowthSize()
      Number of examples (per each class) to label and add to initial training set in one iteration of co-training.
      int getGrowthSize(java.lang.String className)
      For a class: in each iteration of co-training, this is the number of unlabeled examples (most confidently belonging to the class) which should be labeled and added to initial training set
      static CoTrainingSettings getInstance()
      Returns a singleton instance of CoTrainingSettings (co-training experiment settings)
      int getIterations()
      Returns the number of iterations of co-training.
      int getPoolSize()
      Returns the number of instances in small unlabeled pool u' (if 0 pool is not used)
      boolean isInitiated() 
      boolean isLabelAllUnlabeled()
      if true finish co-training when all unlabeled instances are labeled (and ignore iteration no.)
      boolean isTestEachIteration()
      Whether or not should the co-training classifier be evaluated in each iteration (if so, the results will be logged)
      void printSettings(java.io.PrintStream out)
      Print co-training parameters used in the experiment
      void readProperties(java.lang.String propertiesFile)
      Reads the Co-training settings from properties file

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        public int getPoolSize()
        Returns the number of instances in small unlabeled pool u' (if 0 pool is not used)
        Returns:
        pool size u'

      • getGrowthSize

        public int getGrowthSize(java.lang.String className)
        For a class: in each iteration of co-training, this is the number of unlabeled examples (most confidently belonging to the class) which should be labeled and added to initial training set
        Parameters:
        className - name of the class
        Returns:
        growth size for that class (p/n)

      • getGrowthSize

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getGrowthSize()
        Number of examples (per each class) to label and add to initial training set in one iteration of co-training. Key: class name, value: no. of examples to label for that class
        Returns:
        the growth size for all classes

      • getIterations

        public int getIterations()
        Returns the number of iterations of co-training. Ignored if all unlabeled data should be labeled (see isLabelAllUnlabeled())
        Returns:
        number of iterations of co-training k

      • isLabelAllUnlabeled

        public boolean isLabelAllUnlabeled()
        if true finish co-training when all unlabeled instances are labeled (and ignore iteration no.)
        Returns:
        whether or not to label all available unlabeled data

      • isTestEachIteration

        public boolean isTestEachIteration()
        Whether or not should the co-training classifier be evaluated in each iteration (if so, the results will be logged)
        Returns:
        whether to test each iteration of co-training

      • readProperties

        public void readProperties(java.lang.String propertiesFile)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads the Co-training settings from properties file
        Parameters:
        propertiesFile - path and file name for the properties file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there was an error reading the properties

      • printSettings

        public void printSettings(java.io.PrintStream out)
        Print co-training parameters used in the experiment
        Parameters:
        out - stream for writing
